column2: Thank you for showing me that you can be soft and strong and loving all-in-one. I'm going to miss our workout sessions and study dates around the city (Bennu, Mozarts, the public library!!!) as well as our trips to Trader Joe's or even the OV sample sales. You're going to kill it in NYC! Just *please* don't catch COVID-19 while you're at it. Love ya.
